mapper.insert: insert into cart_sign (id, mid, mname, gid, gname, cid, cname, planStartDate, planEndDate, signatureImageA, signatureImageB, signDateA, signDateB) values (#{id}, #{mid}, #{mname}, #{gid}, #{gname}, #{cid}, #{cname}, #{planStartDate}, #{planEndDate}, #{signatureImageA}, #{signatureImageB}, #{signDateA}, #{signDateB})
